title: Re: how can i get my acc back??
body:
hello my name is lolthepooleesin1 and I want my lvl30 acc back it's iamkorean123 and everyone reported me so Riot stopped my lvl30 bronze3 acc
so anyone can help???

replies.body: If your account was banned, then the only chance you have of getting it back is by contacting support via the support section of the website (link: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us). That said, you will only be given the account back *if* Riot determines that you were falsely banned, which is a rare occurrence in itself. The best advice I can give is to provide as much information on the situation as you can when you submit your ticket.
Hi I write this and I can log into lol oce league of legends.com but I can't log into game
